item.description:
EVENT UPDATE***From the Boston Red Sox, All spots are full. There are no open spots. There is no Waiting List for this event.*** 

Are you a Red Sox fan that wants to help the Red Sox prepare for the 100th Anniversary Celebration of Fenway Park?

Time is from 6:30-9:00PM on Thursday.

You would wear warm clothes and sneakers.
item.how_to_find_us: Confidential Confirmation E Mails to selected people have been sent from South Shore Casting. Please follow instructions.
item.name: Red Sox in need of Stand Ins to help with 100th Anniversary Rehearsals
